entry.data:
CLEAR
WIDESPREAD FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

WIDESPREAD FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
